name: Latex Dungeon
description:
After reading a mysterious book, Laven found herself sucked into a depraved and insane world.
Will she fall and succumb to her desires, or can she endure and bring order to this world?FeaturesIntense & Erotic Battles
Laven may find herself transforming during battle, especially when enemies force themselves on her
Monster Menagerie
Latex, Tentacles, Slime, Insects, Demons... 100+ are all just waiting for a chance to pounce on our heroine.
Level-Up Through Depravity
It would certainly be nice to maintain your purity, but then you'd be missing out on the depraved defeats you could be enjoying.
Illustrations Galore
This adventure contains 62 CGs with over 700 variations. Have fun collecting all 12 sets of erotic walking animations, and all 25 intercourse animations!
